name: Transformation Scroll (Sohee)
description: Use it to transform into Sohee for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

name: Transformation Scroll (UFO-BIG-CAT)
description: After use, Becomes UFO-BIG-CAT for a certain period. Note! When rides or dies, the transformation will be cancelled. Your action cannot be cancelled after the item has been opened. (Able to transform into a Big Cat warrior for a short time, which seems to be able to cause a heavy blow to the evil creatures that will appear at a certain time on the earth.)
